original_text:
The oracle of the word of the Lord is against the land of Hadrach
    and Damascus is its resting place.
For the Lord has an eye on mankind
    and on all the tribes of Israel,
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이 하드락 땅에 내리며 다메섹에 머물리니 사람들과 이스라엘 모든 지파의 눈이 여호와를 우러러봄이니라

sentences.original_text: The oracle of the word of the Lord is against the land of Hadrach
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와의 말씀의 경고는 하드락 땅을 향하며

sentences.original_text: and Damascus is its resting place.
For the Lord has an eye on mankind
and on all the tribes of Israel,
